aboutusintro.title: About Khodiyar Brass Industries
aboutusintro.subtitle: Leaders in precision brass manufacturing
aboutusintro.description: Established in 1985, Khodiyar Brass Industries has grown to become one of India's leading manufacturers of precision brass components. We specialize in producing high-quality brass fittings, valves, electrical components, and custom machined parts for diverse industrial applications worldwide.

expertise.title: Our Industry Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Serving diverse industries with precision brass components
expertise.description: Our brass components are trusted across multiple industries for their durability, precision, and reliability.

sectors.name: Oil & Gas

items.name: Rajesh Kumar
items.content: Khodiyar Brass Industries has been our trusted partner for over 15 years. Their quality consistency and timely delivery have been exceptional.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: The precision and quality of their brass components have exceeded our expectations. Highly recommended for critical applications.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Common questions about our products and services

items.question: What is the minimum order quantity?
items.answer: Our minimum order quantity varies by product type. For standard brass fittings, it's typically 100 pieces, while custom components may have different requirements based on complexity.

items.question: What are the typical lead times?
items.answer: Standard products: 2-3 weeks, Custom components: 4-6 weeks, depending on complexity and quantity. We also offer expedited services for urgent requirements.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Precision Excellence?
